Player History
Injured on 8/8/1965 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/23/1967, off Dave Leonhard (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/26/1967, off Jim Lonborg (CHC)...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/3/1973 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/6/1976 to a 2-year deal worth $815,000 per year...
